Package com.tiborszabo.quizapp.objects

Class Question

java.lang.Object
com.tiborszabo.quizapp.objects.Question
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Question extends Object implements Serializable
This object represents the questions.
Author:
Tibor Peter Szabo.

  • Constructor Details

    • Question

      public Question()
      Initializes the Question object.

    • Question

      public Question(String name, Question.QuestionType questionType, String question, String explanation, LinkedHashMap<String,Boolean> answers)
      Initializes the Question object with parameters.
      Parameters:
      questionType - QuestionType, type of the question.
      question - String, the question of the Question.
      answers - LinkedHashMap of Strings and booleans, the answer(s) of the question. It's multiple options for SINGLECHOICE and MULTICHOICE questions, and a single option for a TEXT type question.
      name - String, the name of the question.
      explanation - String, the explanation of the question.

    • putAnswer

      public void putAnswer(String answer, Boolean correct)
      Appends the answers LinkedHashMap with the pair of answer, correct.
      Parameters:
      answer - , the text of the answers.
      correct - , the validity of the answer. For a TEXT type question, it should always be true.
